name: bbPress Direct Quotes
author: destroflyer

sections.description:
Adds a “Quote” link to each post, which inserts its content (inside of a <blockquote>) to the reply textfield.
Developed for: http://jmonkeyengine.org
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the ‘bbpress-direct-quotes’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

1.1

  • Replaced a hardcoded URL with something more generic
